title: Export to CSV timeouts for large workspaces
summary: Some customers with very large workspaces are experiencing timeouts when exporting dashboards to CSV. The export_service is partially degraded while we roll out a fix.

title: Authentication failures for SSO users in EU region
summary: SSO users in the EU region are intermittently seeing SAML assertion failures. We suspect an issue with clock skew between identity providers and our auth_service.

title: Workspace permissions caching bug
summary: A caching bug caused stale workspace role assignments to persist for up to 30 minutes after changes. Permissions now update correctly and the issue has been resolved.

title: API rate limiting spike for export endpoints
summary: A misconfigured rate limiting rule caused some export API calls to be throttled aggressively. The rule has been rolled back and normal behavior restored.
